questions: Can I generate images using AI inside the app?
Is it possible to create images with AI?
How do I use the AI image generator?
How can I use AI to summarize a long article?
Can the app summarize content with AI?
What's the best way to condense a long block using AI?
How do I make a long section shorter using the AI tools?
answer: Click the AI icon in the content block toolbar, choose 'Condense', and select a word limit (default is 50 words). The app will summarize the full block while maintaining formatting.

questions: Can the app translate entire content blocks?
Can AI translate full sections of my email?
Is there an option to translate all parts of a content block?
How can I use AI to translate content automatically?
answer: Yes. You can translate the full content block—including title, body, and button—into any supported language. The layout and formatting remain fully intact.

questions: What other AI features are available in Proze?
What else can AI do in this app?
Are there more AI tools beyond summarizing and translating?
What extra AI options does the app provide?
answer: In addition to condensing and translating, you can use AI for summarization, brainstorming, rewriting in a different tone, and even freeform interactions similar to ChatGPT.
